NAME: Floppy Disk
DESC: [Effects: Paddle][Type: Defense] Size doesn't always matter. Shrinks the opponents paddle by half.This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Zip Drive
DESC: [Effects: Paddle][Type: Offense] Size always matters. Increases your own paddle by half. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: SUDO SU
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Increases the damage done by the current balls in play by one point.

NAME: Lucky #0x7
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Explodes the ball into several randomly generated (1 through 7) smaller pieces and sent into a random direction ( 0 through 360).

NAME: Hat Trick
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Creates two illusions of the ball.

NAME: Broadband
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Increase the current balls in play speed by a multiplier of 2.

NAME: Virus
DESC: [Effects: Life Points][Type: Offense] Minus 1 HP from both players everytime the ball bounces (this includes off the wall) until it passes through a gate.

NAME: Logic Bomb
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] With each paddle hit the ball increases in damage by one point untill it travels into someones gate. Then it resets to normal.

NAME: AntiVirus
DESC: [Effects: Other][Type: Utility] Removes any buffs from the field.

NAME: Disk Cleaner
DESC: [Effects: Ball] Increase your own health points by 3.

NAME: Fiber Optics
DESC: [Effects: Ball] Increase the speed of all balls by a multiplier of 3 and increase the damage by a multiplier of 2.

NAME: Bug
DESC: [Effects: Paddle] Two paddles instead of one. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Trojan Horse
DESC: [Effects: Life Points][Type: Defense] Get 1 life back from each brick you destroy.

NAME: BitCoin Miner
DESC: [Effects: Life Points][Type: Defense] Get 1 life back from every 3 paddle hit.

NAME: FireWall
DESC: [Effects: Bricks][Type: Defense] Create a layer of bricks on your side of the field. Bricks break after 1 hit. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: SystemBoost
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Increase the speed of the ball for yourself when it is traveling towards your opponents gate.

NAME: Proxy
DESC: [Effects: Other][Type: Utility] Create a wormhole on both sides of the field at random. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Bits & Bytes
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Shrink the ball size down by half for everyone for the current balls in play.

NAME: Clean Sweep
DESC: [Effects: Other][Type: Utility] Removes all buffs off the oponent side of the field.

NAME: Spam
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Everytime the ball bounces it has a 10% chance to multiply. This chance increases by 2% everytime it bounces up to a maximum of 30%. It lasts only for the current ball in play. Stacking multiple cards of this type increases the current chance by 10% automatically.

NAME: Hot Streak
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Offense] Increase the damage you do with the current balls in play towards your enemy gate and only your enemy gate by 2 points.

NAME: Swipe Left
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Utility]  Change the direction of your balls by 45 degrees to the left.

NAME: Swipe Right
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Utility] Change the direction of your balls by 45 degrees to the right.

NAME: Shutdown
DESC: [Effects: Other][Type: Utility] Set a count down timer for 1 minute. Player with the highest health after the 1 minute mark wins. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: SpyWare
DESC: [Effects: Life Points][Type: Defense]Everytime your opponent deflects the ball you gain 2 life back. Last 3 turns. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Biometrics
DESC: [Effects: Bricks][Type: Defense] Creates rotating bricks on your side of the field. Bricks break after 2 hit. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Dial-Up
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Utility] Reduce the current ball speed by half. This card does not stack with itself. Only one card of this type can be active in play at once.

NAME: Payload
DESC: [Effects: Life Points][Type: Offense] Reduce your lifepoints by half, but also reduce your opponents life points by half.

NAME: Player Two
DESC: [Effects: Ball][Type: Utility] Creates another ball on the field permanently.
